paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a BRCA2 variant associated with breast cancer, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: stage I moderately differentiated invasive ductal carcinoma of the breast

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with stage I breast cancer, ER- and PR-positive
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Due to her young age of presentation, she underwent genetic testing and was also found to have a BRCA2 mutation (E49X: 373G>T).

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with breast cancer.

variants.additional_notes: The patient had a recurrent metastatic carcinoma.
key_quotes: Due to her young age of presentation, she underwent genetic testing and was also found to have a BRCA2 mutation (E49X: 373G>T).

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the BRCA2 variant.
